mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, token_hash, expires_at, revoked, created_at, updated_at FROM refresh_tokens WHERE token_hash = #{tokenHash} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO refresh_tokens (user_id, token_hash, expires_at, revoked, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{tokenHash}, #{expiresAt}, #{revoked}, NOW(), NOW())
